price: Saa ara na Yε’bεma abͻneεfoͻ no ayε wͻn ho-wͻn ho nnamfoͻ (Atemmuda) εnam dwuma a wͻ’nsa aka no ho nti.
arabic: وَكَذَٰلِكَ نُوَلِّي بَعۡضَ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ بَعۡضَۢا بِمَا كَانُواْ يَكۡسِبُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wakadhālika nuwallī baʿḍa al-ẓālimīna baʿḍan bimā kānū yaksibūna
